update BOS.PAC_STOCKITEM
WAREHOUSENO = #{warehouseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSCODE = #{goodscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSNAME = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
